co.paralleluniverse.common.io

Interface VersionedPersistable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable

    public interface VersionedPersistable
extends Persistable
    A Persistable that is used by some persistence service that provides automatic versioning.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void read(long version, ByteBuffer buffer)
      Reads the object from the given ByteBuffer.
      Upon return from this method, the buffer's position will have advanced past the read data.

      • Methods inherited from interface co.paralleluniverse.common.io.Persistable

        read, size, write

    • Method Detail

      • read

        void read(long version,
        ByteBuffer buffer)
        Reads the object from the given ByteBuffer.
        Upon return from this method, the buffer's position will have advanced past the read data.
        Parameters:
        version - The version of the object's persisted data.
        buffer - The buffer from which the object is to be read.
